head.title: .NET API to Parse & Extract Hyperlinks from Documents, Pages or Page Area
head.description: GroupDocs.Parser .NET API enables software programmers to extract hyperlinks from documents, pages or page Area of PDF, DOCX, XLSX, CSV, PPTX, EML, MSG, EPUB & many more.

header.title: Extract Hyperlinks from Documents, Pages or Specific page Area via C#/VB.NET API
header.description: GroupDocs.Parser .NET API allows software developers to  parse & extract hyperlinks from documents, pages or page Area of PDF, DOC, DOCX, PPT, PPTX, EML, MSG, XLS, XLSX, CSV, ODT, RTF, EPUB and many other documents.

about.title: How to Parse & Extract Hyperlinks from {{EXT}} documents via {{ProductName}} API?
about.h1: A hyperlink is a piece of text or an image or icon that points to an entire document or to a particular part within a document. The use of hyperlinks allows users to navigate to a web page or document. It is often required to extract hyperlinks from a document and use it to access external document or webpage. {{ProductFullName}} is a fascinating document text extraction API that provides complete functionality for implementing text and metadata extraction solutions. It supports text & hyperlinks extraction from PDF, Emails, Ebooks, Microsoft Office formats: Word (DOC, DOCX), PowerPoint (PPT, PPTX), Excel (XLS, XLSX), LibreOffice formats and many more. It supports several advanced features for documents parsing, extracting plain and structured text, text searching by keywords, extract metadata or images, containers as well as attachments and many more.

content_left.description: [{{ProductFullName}}]({{slash_lang}}/parser/{{ProductCode}}/) makes it easy for {{ProgLang}} developers to extract hyperlinks from a {{EXT}} file by implementing a few easy steps.
content_left.step_1: Instantiate [Parser](https://reference.groupdocs.com/net/parser/groupdocs.parser/parser) object for the initial document;
content_left.step_2: Check if the document supports hyperlink extraction;
content_left.step_3: Call [GetHyperlinks](https://reference.groupdocs.com/parser/net/groupdocs.parser/parser/methods/gethyperlinks) method and obtain collection of [PageHyperlinkArea](https://reference.groupdocs.com/parser/net/groupdocs.parser.data/pagehyperlinkarea) objects;
content_left.step_4: Iterate through the collection and get a hyperlink text and URL.

content_right.p1: Plain text extraction support from any supported documents
content_right.p4: Text searching via keyword as well as regular expression
content_right.p5: Extract formatted text, metadata, images, containers, and attachments
